name: FirstJapanese
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: first japanese
des:
This skill you can hear thirty basic Japanese words.
You can see the picture or photo of the words if using Echo with display.

Three modes in this skill.
"Tell me" mode:
 By saying "Tell me" or "Say", this skill speaks a Japanese words and let know know the meaning of the word.
"Quiz" mode:
 By saying "Quiz" or "Ask me", this skill speaks a Japanese word and asks you the meaning of the word. By accepting your answer, skill verifies your answer and provide the correct meaning of the word.
"Question" mode:
 By asking like "What is cat?", "How do you call house?" or so on, skill tells you the Japanese word which you asked. (Skill only answers the question within the supported words by this skill.)

In each mode, you can also say "Again" to hear the same speech again or "Next" for the next question or word if conditions are met.

The words supported by skill:
one, two, three, red, blue, yellow, kids, car, baby, daddy, mommy, dog, cat, pencil, boy, girl, train, bird, airplane, fish, strawberry, orange, apple, mountain, river, moon, sun, house, hand, foot
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
